author: Vox Populi
title: Vox Populi: 'It seems that one of our states, perhaps one of the 13 original colonies, would have been named Columbus in honor of him discovering America.'
text:
SPECIAL OFFER FOR NEW READERS 99 cent digital subscription to savannahnow.com
Subscriber-members get access to ALL our digital products AND become eligible for free event tickets, discount coupons and other benefits. SIGN UP FOR SUBSCRIBER BENEFITS As a Savannah Morning News / savannahnow.com subscriber, you're eligible for members-only discounts. Download your coupons now. By Vox Populi “It seems that one of our states, perhaps one of the 13 original colonies, would have been named Columbus in honor of him discovering America.”
“The Savannah Morning News joined with Forever Tybee, a political action committee that supports certain candidates, to cosponsor the Tybee Candidate Forum! That has the appearance of local media bias, even if none was intended.”
“I don’t care for the Hardee’s commercials either, but tell me where there is a Hardees in Savannah?” [Editor’s note: There are locations in Savannah, Pooler and Richmond Hill. Go to hardees.com to find one closest to you.”
“How can they say ‘no cost of living raise’? Everything I bought this year has gone up. From medication, to groceries, including my insurance. Why is there no cost of living raise? Congress got their 3 percent!”
“Congrats to the SMN on their article about Shabazz. Too bad the county doesn’t have the guts to do something about it.”
Contribute to Vox Populi by calling 912-525-0VOX (0869) or emailing us at vox@savannahnow.com . Be sure to write Vox Populi in the subject field. Not all responses are used.
.
